text: Aerenea flavolineata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Melzer in 1923. It is found in Argentina, Bolivia, Paraguay and Brazil.BioLib.cz - Aerenea flavolineata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Compsosomatini Category:Beetles described in 1923
title: Aerenea flavolineata
